AuthorEntity.description: Entity representing an author with FOAF alignment. Contains personal information, institutional affiliations, and identifiers.

author_institutions.description: Institutions an author is affiliated with

confidence.description: Confidence score for extracted information (0.0 to 1.0)

data_sources.description: List of data sources that contributed to this entity

AuthorEntity.title: AuthorEntity

AuthorPosition.description: Position of author in author list
